other_tests.changes_over_time: Symptoms had clearly worsened after her traumatic experience.

other_tests.findings: Efficacy of exposure therapy for OCD was noted. Frequency and intensity of OCD symptoms were reduced after a year, although some symptoms persisted.
other_tests.changes_over_time: Improved slightly overall, but attendance became sporadic.

other_tests.findings: Ms. A met criteria for PTSD and completed a 12-session PTSD protocol.
other_tests.changes_over_time: Reported feeling less frightened at the thought of encountering the perpetrator.

other_tests.findings: Ms. A was able to relate the trauma in detail and had intense emotional reactions during sessions.
other_tests.changes_over_time: Noticeably less distressed during imaginal exposure sessions, indicating improvement.
